metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29971 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.Description: If a user had granted a permission to a webpage and saved that grant, any webpage running on the same host - irrespective of scheme or port - would be granted that permission. *This bug only affects Firefox for Android. Other operating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 90.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: mozjs78 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
